title: (x) classic serif text face - Plantin {David H}
content:
Hello,

Could you identify this font, please?

Shai

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Clipboard01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808055942/http:/typophile.com/files/Clipboard01.jpg) | 58.22 KB |

 [‹ (x) Wil-Bar International logo - Poppl Laudatio {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808055942/http:/typophile.com/node/14795 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) very rounded "We're Sail-in On" - Too Much {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808055942/http:/typophile.com/node/14783 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Shai

comments.content: I’m afraid it not Garamond. Look closely at the capital “M” and “K”. also, the italic “a” is different. Nope, it must be something else...

Yep, Plantin it is!

Thanks, David!
